scenarios.title: Low Descovy share with missed PrEP opportunity
scenarios.brief: Decile 3 IM prescriber underutilizes PrEP despite steady STI testing in young MSM; inconsistent quarterly labs and follow-ups.
goals: Surface candidate volume from STI testing
Address renal safety within label guidance

scenarios.title: High Descovy share but access and staffing barriers
scenarios.brief: Decile 10 NP with strong share; PA workload and workflow friction limit breadth of appropriate prescribing.
goals: Implement twice-weekly PA batching with pharmacy partner
Run benefits checks upstream of visits
Reassess appropriate TDF users with unrestricted coverage

scenarios.title: Slowing Biktarvy switches in stable patients
scenarios.brief: Switch velocity fell to 1–2 in 13 weeks; perception that most patients are optimized.
goals: Define labeled criteria for considering a switch

scenarios.title: Favoring CAB/RPV without uniform screening
scenarios.brief: CAB share growing; requests often honored without systematic adherence/resistance evaluation.
goals: Use a shared injection calendar workflow

scenarios.title: Low Apretude vs TDF/FTC and Descovy
scenarios.brief: PrEP mix skewed to orals; PA backlog; missing standing lab protocol; adherence misconceptions on long-acting.
goals: Stand up PA batching and lab/injection calendar

scenarios.title: Strong PrEP program but operationally capped
scenarios.brief: High demand; PA burden caps TAF/Apretude; ad-hoc pharmacy engagement.

scenarios.title: Treatment optimization day for switches
scenarios.brief: Hospital-affiliated ID clinic; few recent switches; CAB/RPV interest among adherent younger patients.
goals: Establish counseling script and consent flow

scenarios.title: IO-backbone heavy; ADC toxicity bandwidth
scenarios.brief: Solid-tumor center evaluating ADCs; cost/response and chair time scrutinized; toxicity bandwidth constrained.
goals: Align biomarker-defined subset and evidence category
Advance to tumor board and order sets
guardrails: Cite labeled sources or NCCN categories

scenarios.title: Pathway-driven care with staffing constraints
scenarios.brief: Community infusion; conservative IO use; AE clinics short-staffed; inconsistent education packets.
goals: Add AE one-pager to pathway handouts

scenarios.title: Oral oncolytic onboarding at T-7
scenarios.brief: Hub forms and day-25–30 refill gaps due to late onboarding.
goals: Enroll hub and benefits check at T-7

scenarios.title: Adult flu program underperforming
scenarios.brief: Late clinic launches; weak reminder-recall; coverage fell in 65+.
goals: Launch early clinics with SMS reminders

scenarios.title: Primary care capture with fragmented workflows
scenarios.brief: Adequate storage but VIS misses; ad-hoc Saturday clinics.
goals: Adopt standing orders and huddle checklists

scenarios.title: Employer and college outreach alignment
scenarios.brief: Student uptake low; inventory turns slow due to late campus events.
goals: Schedule campus pop-ups at orientation and midterms

scenarios.title: Outpatient antivirals under-utilized
scenarios.brief: High-risk COPD/ILD; Paxlovid first-line; 3-day remdesivir limited by capacity; DDI triage slows prescribing.
goals: Secure standing infusion slots where eligible

scenarios.title: Post-COVID clinic adherence issues
scenarios.brief: Day 4–5 presentations; callbacks delay start; rebound education variable.
goals: Route day-2 positives to NP tele-start

scenarios.title: Hospital-at-home linkage for antivirals
scenarios.brief: Discharges qualify for outpatient therapy but lack transport for IV remdesivir; home-infusion underused.
goals: Embed discharge checklist and referral workflow

scenarios.title: HFrEF clinic with uneven GDMT adoption
scenarios.brief: Entresto uptake 62% of eligible HFrEF; SGLT2 at 38%; fellows handle PAs; day-30 refill gaps.
goals: Adopt discharge GDMT checklist with accountable owners
Enroll copay support via pharmacy tech
Raise SGLT2 by 10pp and halve 30-day gaps

scenarios.title: Rural HF program with renal concerns
scenarios.brief: SGLT2 underused in CKD stage 3 due to misconceptions; no titration calendar.
goals: Introduce titration calendar with sick-day rules
Track eGFR and UACR at baseline and 12 weeks

scenarios.title: Post-MI and HF transitions program
scenarios.brief: SGLT2 deferrals to PCP; ARNI starts delayed pending echo; readmissions above benchmark.
goals: Start SGLT2 before discharge where eligible
Convert to ARNI within 48–72h per protocol

scenarios.title: Oncology | Time-Pressed HCP
scenarios.brief: HCP is behind schedule and skeptical about value. You get 60 seconds.
goals: Gain permission for a later detail

scenarios.title: HIV PrEP | Adherence concern
scenarios.brief: HCP questions adherence support for certain populations.
